oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video 2
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Paszkowski, Patrick
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: GFPcro BSC-40 cells were co-infected at a total MOI = 5 with VACV-pE/L-mCherry(t) and VACV-mCherry-cro viruses, and tracked using live cell microscopy to detect the appearance of recombinant mCherry-cro protein.
